co.realtime.storage.security

Class TablePolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.realtime.storage.security.TablePolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPolicy

    public class TablePolicy
extends Object
implements IPolicy
    Policies applied specifically to the tables.
    Author:
    RTCS Development Team
